My Portfolio

My portfolio

Welcome to my example portfolio. I created a template website with Sass, Vanilla JS, and HTML as an assignment for the LUT University.

  • This page is responsive with resizing.
  • Adapts the background images with scrolling of every view height.
  • Has a navigation bar that disappears when you scroll down and appears when you scroll up.
  • Highlight in the navigation bar which section of the page you are currently at.
  • contains project links to a test project implementing the connections game from the New York Times and an interactive journal on my process of making this portfolio webpage.

Another random fact about me

I worked on project for specific companies. But all companies let me sign an NDA and I can therefore not tell any specifics.
